shortdesc.ph: Callback triggered when the SDK reads media resource data.
Callback triggered when the SDK reads media resource data.

p.codeblock: virtual int onReadData(unsigned char *buffer, int bufferSize) = 0;

section.p: When you call the method to open a media resource, the SDK triggers this callback and requests you to provide a buffer for the media resource data.
When you call the method to open a media resource, the SDK triggers this callback and requests you to provide the buffer for the media resource data.

plentry.pd: Output parameter indicating the data buffer (in bytes). You need to write data of size bufferSize requested by the SDK into this buffer.
Length of the data buffer (in bytes).
Data buffer. You need to write bufferSize bytes of data requested by the SDK into this buffer. See ByteBuffer.
Length of the data buffer in bytes.

ul.li: If the data is read successfully, returns the actual number of bytes read.
When data is read successfully, returns the actual number of bytes read.
